question: Help me to make a sprint plan to create a library management system
expected_answer: With a team of 3 developers (120 hrs/week, 240 hrs/sprint), the plan: Sprint 1 (40-60 hrs): Setup & wireframing; Sprint 2 (60-80 hrs): Auth & book catalog; Sprint 3 (60-80 hrs): Borrow/return books; Sprint 4 (60-80 hrs): Librarian dashboard; Sprint 5 (40-60 hrs): UI & testing; Sprint 6 (40-60 hrs): Deployment & docs; allow 10-15% buffer time.
